name: Business/System Analyst
description:
ARRIVAL is a technology company making vehicles the way they should be - fully electric, digitally connected, and smart. By creating innovation in vehicle design and manufacturing, Arrival is accelerating autonomous and electric vehicle technology, by fusing AI with new forms of automotive engineering. We are working with some of the world's leading businesses and governments with the goal to re-define how cities look, think and feel. Our vehicles will be 100% built by robots within our microfactories globally. We are recognised by LinkedIn as 2020’s number 1 start-up in the UK for as well as being one the world’s newest Unicorns with a £5 billion valuation.

We’ve assembled some of the finest minds in software, engineering, AI and robotics.
System Analyst role is open for the new product – Traceability, we need specialist, who will be ready for the extremely dynamic work and periodic business trips to UK, the USA, EU countries.
We seek a person with customer oriented attitude and, flexibility and openness for new technologies and ways of working. This is remote based position.

Main Responsibilities:

–– Perform Functional Analysis of Customer's Processes and Prepare Functional Requirements Specifications (FRS)
–– Perform Planning and Follow-up on Testing process from the customer's side
–– Provide Support on Data and Functionality studies
–– Participate in All Project Phases from Initiation to Go-Live
–– Provide Support for the Solutions delivered to the Customers

Requirements:
–– Fluent (C1) English level

  • Bachelor University degree
  • 3+ years of experience on working as business/system analyst in software development projects Knowledge of processes and tools for effective business/system analyses
  • Skills of technical document writing and reviewing
  • System integration-related technologies, protocols, systems (XML, JSON)
  • BPMN/UML
  • Self-confident, self-motivated, looking for challenges
  • Ability to works independently and remotely.

At Arrival we want all of our employees to feel comfortable bringing their passion, creativity and individuality to work. We value all cultures, backgrounds and experiences, as we truly believe that diversity drives innovation. Join our mission for Zero-emission solutions for cities. Human-centred, intelligent design - to revitalise public transportation!
